page.title: 05Employment Newton/Dunham
page.content: Employment is mainly agricultural, farmers employing farm workers and ancilliary employment,agricultural engineers and suppliers, haulage, land drainage and general suppliers. There are a number of self employed, including shopkeepers, publicans, coach proprietors, caravan park owners and a timber merchant.Extra employment is created in the summer months by visitors coming for fishing holidays. Some people commute to local towns to work including teachers, office workers and power station employees. There are a number of unemployed which is a little higher than the national average.Young people find difficult to find work and have to go to the surrounding towns or even move from the area. Very few married women are in fulltime employment.
